com.camerontec.catalys.core.test

Class PartySessionThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.core.session.SessionCustomizerBase
      • com.camerontec.catalys.core.test.PartySessionThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISessionCustomizer, Runnable

    public class PartySessionThread
extends SessionCustomizerBase
implements Runnable
    Manages a session. It rejects sessions that are not known to our SessionFactory.

    This class is also an ISessionCustomizer which allows it to listen to events on its associated session. In particular it implements the partyAccepted method in order to identify the party associated with the session.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PartySessionThread(Session session)
      Create session manager based on the given "anonymous" session.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      String partyAccepted(Object source, IFIXMessage mess)
      Identify the party associated with this message and either reject the party if we have no configuration information for him, or else configure the session for this party.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PartySessionThread

        public PartySessionThread(Session session)
        Create session manager based on the given "anonymous" session. The given party configuration will be used to configure the session once we have identified the party associated with it.
        Parameters:
        session - a session

    • Method Detail

      • partyAccepted

        public String partyAccepted(Object source,
                            IFIXMessage mess)
        Identify the party associated with this message and either reject the party if we have no configuration information for him, or else configure the session for this party.

        Part of the ISessionCustomizer interface.

        Specified by:
        partyAccepted in interface ISessionCustomizer
        Overrides:
        partyAccepted in class SessionCustomizerBase
        Parameters:
        source - Some indication of which session is the source of this event.
        mess - Message received from other party.
        Returns:
        Null if the Session may communicate with the party. Otherwise return an indication of the problem.
        See Also:
        ISessionCustomizer.partyAccepted(java.lang.Object, com.camerontec.catalys.core.message.IFIXMessage)

      • run

        public void run()
        Specified by:
        run in interface Runnable
